name: One on Ones
description:
Created in under 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2019, where the theme is "Only One"!

In this game, you select which One you want to be, and will then find yourself in a battlefield pitted against all the other ones who want to see your demise! Move with WASD or arrow keys, and shoot tiny little 1 bullets with a left mouse-click. Get one dollar bills when you defeat enemies, and use them to purchase upgrades at the end of each round. Find glowing powerups that temporarily increase your abilities (or heal you). Do you have what it takes to make it to the top 10 high-scores?

Controls

WASD or Arrows to Move
Aim with the Mouse
Left-Mouse click to shoot
